summary.span: 表示 实现，可基于在服务上配置的 提供安全令牌序列化程序。

span.span: Represents a implementation that provides security token serializers based on the configured on the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类创建 类的实例。This class creates instances of the class. 每个服务通道侦听器都有一个此类的实例。There is one instance of this class for each service channel listener. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写此类，以创建自定义的服务凭据令牌管理器。The following code shows how to override this class to create a customized Service Credentials Token Manager. The security token authenticator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以选择通过一个方法返回 `outOfBand` 令牌解析程序，在处理安全事务时，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 安全处理器将使用该方法来处理不在 SOAP 消息中的令牌。An `outOfBand` token resolver can optionally be returned by the method, which is used by the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] security processor to resolve tokens that are not in the SOAP message when processing security. 由该方法返回的 将验证令牌并提取声明。The that is returned by this method validates tokens and extracts claims. 为从 派生的每个类创建一个 。One is created for each class derived from . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写此方法的示例。The following code is an example of how to override this method. [!code-csharp[c_CustomTokenAuthenticator#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customtokenauthenticator/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[c_CustomTokenAuthenticator#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customtokenauthenticator/vb/source.vb#2)]

summary.span: 基于 创建安全令牌提供程序。

The security token provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责获取给定的 的令牌。The class is responsible for obtaining tokens for a given . 令牌提供程序还可以支持续订和取消令牌。Optionally, token providers can support renewing and canceling tokens as well. 如果进行了相应的配置，令牌提供程序可以缓存令牌。The token provider can cache tokens if it is configured to do so. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写此方法。The following code shows how to override this method. [!code-csharp[ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/clientcredentialssecuritytokenmanager/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ClientCredentialsSecurityTokenManager#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/clientcredentialssecuritytokenmanager/vb/source.vb#4)]

span.span: The version of the security token.

summary.span: 基于传入的安全令牌版本创建安全令牌序列化程序。

span.span: Creates a security token serializer based on the security token version passed in.
The security token serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于写入和读取安全令牌和安全令牌引用。The is used for writing and reading security tokens and security token references. 从 XML 反序列化令牌时，返回的令牌必须能够执行加密操作。When deserializing the token from XML, the returned token must be able to perform cryptographic operations. 令牌序列化程序必须能够执行足够的验证，以确保令牌可以执行加密操作（Kerberos 票证处理、X.509 解码、SAML 解码等），但应遵循身份验证器的应用程序信任决定。The token serializer must be able to do enough validation to ensure that the token can do cryptographic operations (Kerberos ticket processing, X.509 decoding, SAML decoding, and so on) but should defer application trust decisions to the authenticator.

exception.span: 无法为传入的 创建安全令牌序列化程序。

span.span: A security token serializer cannot be created for the that was passed in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象使您能够配置服务凭据和服务凭据身份验证设置。The object enables you to configure service credentials as well as service credential authentication settings.
